name: Summer Tofu Stir-Fry
description: Packed with protein, veggies and juicy peaches, this dish comes together in a sweet ‘n tangy flash! Easy to customize, swap tofu for sliced chicken and when fresh veggies aren’t in season – use frozen.

ingredients.name: General Tao Seasoning or Sweet & Sour Stir-Fry Seasoning

preparation: Place rice and 2 cups water in Multipurpose Steamer. Top with tray; microwave uncovered, on high, 16–18 min.
In bowl, combine seasoning, remaining 1⁄2 cup water, soy sauce, and rice vinegar. Set aside.
In wok, heat oil over high heat.
Meanwhile, cut tofu into cubes. Stir-fry tofu until golden brown on some sides, about 4–5 min.
Stir in green beans and peaches. Sauté until beans are tender-crisp, about 2 min. Add reserved seasoning mixture; cook for 1–2 min until sauce is reduced.
Serve over rice and add toppings, if desired.
tips: Swap peaches for other summer stone fruits like nectarines or plums.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: General Tao Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: A restaurant favourite at home made with less sugar & sodium. Stir fried, not deep fried.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
